Vision

To be a leading Department of the University of Botswana and academic Center of Excellence in Africa and the region through advancement and promotion of scholarship, research and innovation

Mission

To advance the intellectual capacity of the nation and the international community by offering quality academic programmes that are bench-marked against international standards.
